page.title: 20NORTHEND FARM
page.content: Northend Farm is at least 400 years old. Stanhill Farms own this and 3 other farms in the area. The farm covers 100 hectares and employs 8 men and 30 women. The farm has 10 tractors, seed drills, ploughs, a harvester, and machinery in the packhouses.The farm also has offices, dry packhouse, wet packhouse, cold stores, warehouses, tractor shed, work shop, storage buildings, canteen, cottage and farm house. The farm is entirely arable and has these crops: 5 hectares apples, 15 hectares pears, 28 hectares cabbages, 6 hectares marrows, 4 hectares onions, 7 hectares swedes, 10 hectares peas, 2 hectares beans, 12 hectares wheat & barley, 11 hectares fallow. The farm sells its crops to supermarkets, wholesalers and local shops.
